definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: The lug boss is completely arranged in an annular groove at the right end of the piston head.
sentences.chinese: 所述凸臺全部置於所述活塞頭右端的環狀槽內。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinic effect of ligating and hanging operating skill on circular mixed hemorrhoid.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察結紮懸吊法治療環狀混合痔臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Hyoid bone and arytenoid cartilages were resected and cricoid cartilage anastomosis with the base of the tongue and submental muscles.
sentences.chinese: 常規切除舌骨將環狀軟骨與舌根及頦下肌肉吻合。

sentences.english: The 13C-NMR and 1H-NMR spectra were reported for the macrocyclic polyaryl-ester oligomer.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道了環狀聚芳酯低聚物的核磁共振碳譜及氫譜。

sentences.english: Blade and reclining rails shall be connected to each other with a ring.
sentences.chinese: 尖軌和傾斜軌應由環狀物連接在一起。

sentences.english: The house is situated near a busy round-about with lots of noisy traffic.
sentences.chinese: 住宅靠近一個繁忙的環狀交叉路口，交通噪音非常大。

sentences.english: Bring the fingers and thumb together as if holding a phallus near the forehead.
sentences.chinese: 將四根手指和大拇指結成環狀，就好像握住JB一樣。

sentences.english: Objective To search a better surgical method in the treatment of circular mixed hemorrhoid.
sentences.chinese: 目的探求更加完善的治療環狀混合痔的手術方法。

sentences.english: There is only one lower-energy orbital in a cyclic system.
sentences.chinese: 在環狀體系中只有一個最低能量軌道。

sentences.english: The results demonstrated the main observed characteristics of the loop-like coronal mass ejection.
sentences.chinese: 模擬結果再現了環狀日冕物質拋射的主要觀測特徵。

sentences.english: The road goes around in a loop and rejoins the main road about 2 kilometers past the town.
sentences.chinese: 這條路呈環狀，在城外兩公里處與幹道會合。

sentences.english: This toxin is a class of monocyclic heptapeptides with many different isomerides.
sentences.chinese: 該毒素是一類具有多種異構體的環狀多肽物質。

sentences.english: Sterling silver and diamond pave crescent moons that can be added to hoop earrings of your choice.
sentences.chinese: 純銀與鑽石鑲嵌的新月可以加添在你鐵環狀耳環上。

sentences.english: The experimental conditions for the formation of Liesegang rings are also discuSsed.
sentences.chinese: 探索了環狀週期沉澱生成的條件。

sentences.english: Loop network is transformed into branch network by the smallest growing groove method.
sentences.chinese: 應用最小生成樹叢法，將環狀管網轉變成枝狀管網。

sentences.english: Familiarity with the appearance of this artefact will help sonographers to avoid diagnostic errors.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉環狀軟骨側邊聲像，可助超聲診斷醫師避免誤診。
